+yMin--;
 return result;
 }

 }

 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }

 }

 }

 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }

 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max,double initial) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifySequence(min,initial,max);
 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
+synchronized(this){
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
+}
 }
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }

 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }

 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){

 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max,double initial) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifySequence(min,initial,max);
 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
 }
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
-setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
+setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
+assert (initial>=0):"Receive a negative tratment";
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
 }
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);

 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(initial,0);

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max,double initial) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifySequence(min,initial,max);
 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
 }
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
+}
+if(yInitial>yMin){
+yInitial=yMin;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 setResult(yMin,0);

 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;

 setResult(yMin,0);

 }

 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;

 }

------------Solution---------------
 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max,double initial) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifySequence(min,initial,max);
 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
 }
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
-return result;
+return max;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);

 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 }

 clearResult();

 return result;

 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;

 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
-return result;
+return result+max;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);

 if(yMin*yMax>0){

 }

------------Candidate---------------
 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max,double initial) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifySequence(min,initial,max);
 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
 }
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
+if(yMin==f.value(min)){
+return yMax;
+}
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;

 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }

 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }

 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;

 verifySequence(min,initial,max);
 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
 }
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
-setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
+setResult(yMin,0);
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 clearResult();

 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
 }

-if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
+if(Math.abs(yMin)<0||Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }

 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }

 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);

 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }

 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);

 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }

 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
+}
+if(yInitial<=0){
+yInitial=1;
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);

+setResult(yMin-1,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMin<0){
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;
 }
 if(yInitial*yMax<0){
-return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
+return initial;
 }
 if(yMin*yMax>0){
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 return solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);
 }

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max,double initial) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifySequence(min,initial,max);
 double yInitial=f.value(initial);
 if(Math.abs(yInitial)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(initial,0);
 return result;
 }
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMin,0);
 return result;
 }

+if(min<0){
+return 0;
+}
+if(min>=yInitial){
+return yInitial-1;
+}
 return solve(f,min,yMin,initial,yInitial,min,yMin);
 }

 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(yMax,0);
 return result;

 return solve(f,initial,yInitial,max,yMax,initial,yInitial);

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
-setResult(max,0);
+setResult(max,ret,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {

 ret=min;
 }else {

 }

------------Candidate---------------
 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
+min++;
 }
 }
 return ret;
 }

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }

 }
 }else {

 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }

-verifyInterval(min,max);
+verifyInterval(min,Math.max(min,max));
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {

 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }

 double yMax=f.value(max);

 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;

 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;

 }

 }else {

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
+setResult(max,0);
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
-setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }
 return ret;

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
+assert (f!=null);

 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {

 }else {

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }

 }else {
+ret=max;
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
-ret=max;
 }
 }
 }

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
+assert (f!=null);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }
 return ret;
 }

 double yMax=f.value(max);

+if(sign>0||sign==3){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {

 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;

 }

 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
-ret=max;
+ret=max<0?0:max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }
 return ret;
 }

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
+JOptionPane.showMessageDialog(null,"No se pudo cargar la cancin","Error",JOptionPane.ERROR_MESSAGE);
 }
 }

------------Candidate---------------
 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
+if(ret!=max){
 setResult(max,0);
-ret=max;
+}
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }
 return ret;
 }

 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
-setResult(min,0);
+setResult(min,0-1);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
-setResult(max,0);
+setResult(max-1,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }
 return ret;
 }

 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
-ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
+ret=(solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin)+min)%min;
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }
 return ret;
 }

 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_72_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BrentSolver.java[146,204]
------------Candidate---------------
 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
-ret=min;
+ret=min*2;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
-ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
+ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin)*2;
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }
 return ret;
 }

 clearResult();

 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {

 }else {

+ret=min*2;
 }else {
 ret=max;
 }

 ret=min;

 }else {
 ret=max;
 }
 }
 }

 public double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double min,double max) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 clearResult();
 verifyInterval(min,max);
 double ret=Double.NaN;
 double yMin=f.value(min);
 double yMax=f.value(max);
 double sign=yMin*yMax;
+if(ret==0){
+if(sign<0){
+ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
+}else {
+if(yMin==0.0){
+ret=min;
+}else {
+ret=max;
+}
+}
+}else {
 if(sign>0){
 if(Math.abs(yMin)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(min,0);
 ret=min;
 }else {
 if(Math.abs(yMax)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(max,0);
 ret=max;
 }else {
 throw MathRuntimeException.createIllegalArgumentException(NON_BRACKETING_MESSAGE,min,max,yMin,yMax);
 }
 }
 }else {
 if(sign<0){
 ret=solve(f,min,yMin,max,yMax,min,yMin);
 }else {
 if(yMin==0.0){
 ret=min;
 }else {
 ret=max;
+}
 }
 }
 }
 return ret;
 }

+while(x2<maximalIterationCount){

 }else {

 }else {

 }else {

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
+x0=x1;
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
+x0=x1;
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
-y1=y2;
+y1=0;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 }else {

 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
-return result;
+return y0;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
-if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
+if(Math.abs(y1)<functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 x2=x0;

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
-y1=y2;
+y1=0.0;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

------------Candidate---------------
 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
-i++;
+x2++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
-y1=y2;
+y1=-1;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
+return result;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

------------Candidate---------------
 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
+x0++;
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
+i++;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
+x0--;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_72_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BrentSolver.java[206,318]
------------Candidate---------------
 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
+i--;
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {

 }else {

 }else {
 p=-p;
 }

 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {

 delta=p/p1;
 }

 }else {

 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }

 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){

 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;

 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }

 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
-x1=x2;
+x1=x2*y0;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 p1=-p1;
 }else {

 }else {

 }

 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }

 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }

 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {

 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {

 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
+setResult(x1,i);
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }

 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
+setResult(x1,i);
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }

 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }

 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;

 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {

 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }

 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;

 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }

 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }

 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;

 oldDelta=delta;

------------Candidate---------------
 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
+x2=x0;
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }

 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }

 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }

 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
+x0=x1;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

+setResult(x1,i);
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 }else {

 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }

 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;

 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }

 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;

 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {

 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }

 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }

 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;

 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;

 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
-setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
+setResult(x1,i);
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
+setResult(x1,i);
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);

 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;

 p1=1.0-r3;

 delta=0.5*dx;

 }else {

 }

 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
-setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {

 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
+setResult(x1,i);
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 }else {

 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
+x2=x0;
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
-y0=y1;
+y0=(y1+y1)%y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
-x1=x2;
+x1=x2<0?0:x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 double delta=x1-x0;

 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){

 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;

+if(x0<=0){
+return -1;
 }

 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;

 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {

 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
+}
+if(x0<0){
+x0=0;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
+}
+if(x2<0){
+x2=0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
+if(y0!=y1){
 x0=x1;
+}
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
-y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

---------START : 2019.09.07 AD at 09:38:54 CDT
---------TIME : 2019.09.07 AD at 14:38:55 CDT
--------------- END -----------------
FILE : /home/jiajun/GenPat/artifacts-bak/projects/math/math_72_buggy/src/main/java/org/apache/commons/math/analysis/solvers/BrentSolver.java[206,318]
------------Candidate---------------
 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
-x0=x1;
+x0=x1*2;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
-y1=y2;
+y1=y2*2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;

 }else {

 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;

 return result;

 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;

 oldDelta=delta;

 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
+x0=x1;
+if(x0<0){
 x0=x1;
+}
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }

 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {

 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }

 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }

 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {

 }

 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }

 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){

 oldDelta=delta;

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{
 double delta=x1-x0;
 double oldDelta=delta;
 int i=0;
 while(i<maximalIterationCount){
 if(Math.abs(y2)<Math.abs(y1)){
 x0=x1;
 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;
 y0=y1;
 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;
 }
 if(Math.abs(y1)<=functionValueAccuracy){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 double dx=x2-x1;
 double tolerance=Math.max(relativeAccuracy*Math.abs(x1),absoluteAccuracy);
 if(Math.abs(dx)<=tolerance){
 setResult(x1,i);
 return result;
 }
 if((Math.abs(oldDelta)<tolerance)||(Math.abs(y0)<=Math.abs(y1))){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
+}else {
+if(dx>0.0){
+x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
+if(dx<=0.0){
+x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
+}
+}
 double r3=y1/y0;
 double p;
 double p1;
 if(x0==x2){
 p=dx*r3;
 p1=1.0-r3;
 }else {
 double r1=y0/y2;
 double r2=y1/y2;
 p=r3*(dx*r1*(r1-r2)-(x1-x0)*(r2-1.0));
 p1=(r1-1.0)*(r2-1.0)*(r3-1.0);
 }
 if(p>0.0){
 p1=-p1;
 }else {
 p=-p;
 }
 if(2.0*p>=1.5*dx*p1-Math.abs(tolerance*p1)||p>=Math.abs(0.5*oldDelta*p1)){
 delta=0.5*dx;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }else {
 oldDelta=delta;
 delta=p/p1;
 }
 }
 x0=x1;
 y0=y1;
 if(Math.abs(delta)>tolerance){
 x1=x1+delta;
 }else {
 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 if(dx>0.0){
 x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
 }else {
 if(dx<=0.0){
 x1=x1-0.5*tolerance;
 }
 }
 }
 y1=f.value(x1);
 if((y1>0)==(y2>0)){
 x2=x0;
 y2=y0;
 delta=x1-x0;
 oldDelta=delta;
 }
 i++;
 }
 throw new MaxIterationsExceededException(maximalIterationCount);
 }

 private double solve(UnivariateRealFunction f,double x0,double y0,double x1,double y1,double x2,double y2) throws MaxIterationsExceededException,FunctionEvaluationException{

 x1=x2;
 x2=x0;

 y1=y2;
 y2=y0;

 return result;

+x1=x1+0.5*tolerance;
